headline: Dover Corporation (DOV): An Undervalued Dividend Aristocrat to Buy Now
summary: We recently published a list of the 11 Undervalued Dividend Aristocrats to Buy Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Dover Corporation (NYSE:DOV) stands against other undervalued dividend aristocrats. Dividend-paying stocks are regaining popularity this year as investors look for ways to soften the blow of current market challenges. […]
